articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Germany detects first mpox variant Ib case - DW (English)
articles.description: An infection with the new mpox variant Ib has been detected for the first time in Germany. The strain has been spreading in several African countries for months.
articles.content:
Germany's disease control agency, the Robert Koch Institute (RKI), announced on Tuesday that an mpox infection that was contracted abroad had been detected within the country. 
Despite the detection… [+1905 chars]
